thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com | 5 of 105
thread.title: Robin Marshall

author: Robin Marshall
title: Robin Marshall
text:
I have used OFX on numerous occasions in the past and they honestly provide outstanding rates and service.
Increasing the minimum value at which point the transaction fee is removed was a little annoying, as it was slightly higher then the amount I was transferring and so I shopped around and found TorFX.
Given their customer ratings and feedback, I gave them a go and found their account set up delays left me questioning their ratings. Once set up I received a Quote: from both companies simultaneously.
Even though TorFX didn't have a fixed fee and the amount transferred was relatively modest, the purchased amount through OFX was three digits better.
So whilst OFX aren't quite as cheap as years past, they still offer much better value then their competition.
